alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Kiowa County through 545 PM MDT... At 507 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Chivington, or 27 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chivington and Brandon. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
